Question: Portugal did not comply with the Continental System, so in 1807 this person invaded with the support of Spain.
Hints: This person was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble Italian ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
This person arrived in Paris on 20 March and governed for a period now called the Hundred Days.
This person was baptised as a Catholic just before his second birthday, on 21 July 1771 at Ajaccio Cathedral.
